entries.title: Grand Theft Auto Online has its own Dark Souls-style critical security vulnerability on PC
entries.description: You should avoid playing GTA Online until further notice.

entries.title: After a wave of layoffs, 343 studio head declares 'Halo and the Master Chief are here to stay'
entries.description: There have been questions about 343's future following Microsoft's restructuring.

entries.title: Become a true artist with The Joy of Painting mod for Morrowind
entries.description: Pop down your easel for a photo mode of an entirely new kind.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #582, January 22
entries.description: Here's a Wordle hint to help you out and the full answer if you need it.

entries.title: Great moments in PC gaming: Building a robot servant in The Sims 4
entries.description: He's got some hidden functionality under that innocent, chrome exterior, as it turns out.

entries.title: Here's four hours of Skyblivion
entries.description: Watch a meaty demonstration of how the mod combining Oblivion and Skyrim is coming along.

entries.title: Endless Dungeon has a release date, and you can get Dungeon of the Endless for free
Cool Water Alert: Watch water drain from fish tank bullet holes in Phantom Fury
entries.description: Tanks a lot for that feature, Phantom Fury team.
